channel.title: Ryan T. Skelskey | Blog
channel.description: I'm Ryan Skelskey and I'll be blogging about the businesses I work with: Tailor Made SF - Mobile Tailoring | The Hydrilla - Design and Demolition | Head Lands Productions - Video Production. Check out my Affiliates Page for more info.

item.title: Tailor Maid is hiring Seamstresses
item.description:
Tailor Maid is looking to hire experienced Seamstresses

Tailor Maid is a fast-growing San Francisco Tailoring company. We are currently looking for qualified Seamstresses who have experience with Bridal gowns, bridesmaid dresses and high-end, couture evening wear. 10-20 years experience is preferable.

We have full and part time positions available with flexible hours. Please contact Marissa at (415) 410-8699 to schedule an interview or submit your resume to marissa.tailormaid@gmail.com.

Please include a resume and samples of your work with your email.

Thanks,

Ryan Skelskey
